internet-points.title: Internet Points™️
internet-points.description: You can get Internet Points™️ by getting reacted with any of :v_:'s variations, getting reacted with :ohno: or sending messages, you will lose them if you get reacted with :ohyes:

internet-points.title: Shop
internet-points.description: You can buy items from the shop with Internet Points™️, use `;buy <item>` to buy that item, you can use `;buy` to see a list of items

extra-args.title: Extra args
extra-args.description: You can pass and extra argument to commands, to do so, you have to add `--<argument name>='<argument value>'` after the normal arguments, it also accepts the `--<argument name>` format

help.title: Help
help.description: just use `;help` for a list of commands or `;help <command name>` for info about that command lol

items.title: Items
items.description: They are currently useless, use `;inventory` to see a list of all your items
